short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Verify legitimate websites & protect yourself from online scams

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: "Save time and money while staying secure online with our Chrome extension that highlights official government websites, helping you avoid costly third-party services and dangerous phishing traps. With one click, this extension detects and flags genuine government resources, ensuring you access authentic sites for tasks like renewing licenses, applying for benefits, or submitting documents. Say goodbye to unnecessary fees and the risk of fraudâ€”gain confidence knowing you're navigating the web safely and efficiently. Protect your pocket and your peace of mind with this essential tool for every smart internet user!"
